data.comment: The match is underway at Braga Municipal.
Rui Costa signals a free kick to Braga in their own half.
In the minute 2, Free kick for Santa Clara in their own half.
Ball safe as Braga is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In Braga Braga drive forward through Paulinho. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 3, Braga have been awarded a corner by Rui Costa.
Throw-in high up the field for Braga in Braga.
Free kick for Braga in the half of Santa Clara.
In the minute 4, Rui Costa signals a free kick to Santa Clara.
Santa Clara take a 0-1 lead thanks to Thiago Santana.
Rafael Ramos instrumental with a fine assist.
In the minute 7, Rui Costa awards the home team a throw-in.
Free kick Santa Clara.
Santa Clara surge into the attack at Braga Municipal but Mikel Villanuevaâ€™s header is off-target.
In the minute 8, Ball goes out of play for a Braga goal kick.
Santa Clara to take a throw-in in Braga territory.
Corner awarded to Braga.
In the minute 10, Santa Clara awarded a free kick in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Rui Costa awards Santa Clara a goal kick.
In the minute 12, Thiago Santana of Santa Clara is pulled up for offside.
Throw-in for Braga close to the penalty box.
Free kick in a good position for Braga!
In the minute 15, Braga's Ricardo Horta gets in a shot on goal at Braga Municipal. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Can Braga get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Santa Clara's half?
Braga are pushing forward but Francisco Moura's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 16, Santa Clara have a goal kick.
In Braga a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Braga's Nuno Sequeira has been booked in Braga.
In the minute 18, Throw-in for Braga in the half of Santa Clara.
Braga have been awarded a corner by Rui Costa.
Andre Horta for Braga gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 18, Goal kick for Santa Clara at Braga Municipal.
Throw-in for Braga at Braga Municipal.
Santa Clara awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 22, Francisco Moura for Braga is whistled offside.
Corner awarded to Braga.
Corner awarded to Braga.
In the minute 23, Ricardo Horta gets his shot on target but fails to score for Braga.
Rui Costa signals a Santa Clara throw-in in Braga's half.
Santa Clara needs to be cautious. Braga have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 25, Rui Costa signals a throw-in for Braga, close to Santa Clara's area.
Santa Clara awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in Braga.
Santa Clara's Carlos Carvalho looks ok and returns to the pitch.
Braga's Francisco Moura is whistled for offside at Braga Municipal.
In the minute 27, Carlos Carvalho is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
In the minute 28, At Braga Municipal, Thiago Santana has been yellow-carded for the away team.
Throw-in for Braga in their own half.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Carlos Carvalho.
In the minute 30, It's a goal kick for the away team in Braga.
Carlos Carvalho for Santa Clara is back on the field again.
Marco Pereira (Santa Clara) gets a yellow card.
In the minute 31, Free kick for Braga in their own half.
Santa Clara's Carlos Carvalho misses with an attempt on goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Braga goal kick.
In the minute 32, Santa Clara awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Rui Costa signals a free kick to Santa Clara in their own half.
David Carmo (Braga) has received a yellow card from Rui Costa.
In the minute 34, Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Thiago Santana for Santa Clara who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
Thiago Santana has recovered and rejoins the match in Braga.
Rui Costa awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 38, Throw-in for Santa Clara in their own half.
Braga awarded a free kick in their own half.
Braga to take a throw-in in Santa Clara territory.
In the minute 42, Jean Patrick Lima dos Reis is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
Jean Patrick Lima dos Reis is back on his feet again.
Free kick for Braga in the half of Santa Clara.
In the minute 44, Can Braga capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Santa Clara's half?
Braga have a dangerous throw-in.
Braga are in shooting range from this free kick.
In the minute 45, 3 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
Braga are coming forward and Andre Horta gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Rui Costa awards Santa Clara a goal kick.
In the minute 45, Jean Patrick Lima dos Reis for the away team is judged to be offside.
Rui Costa signals a throw-in for Braga, close to Santa Clara's area.
Rui Costa signals a free kick to Braga.
In the minute 45, Braga have been awarded a corner by Rui Costa.
The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
The second half has started at Braga Municipal.
In the minute 46, Rui Costa signals a Braga throw-in in Santa Clara's half.
In the minute 46, Wenderson Galeno is replacing Francisco Moura for Braga at Braga Municipal.
Braga make their second substitution with Iuri Medeiros replacing Al Musrati.
The away team have replaced Thiago Santana with Cryzan. This is the first substitution made today by Daniel Ramos.
Rui Costa signals a free kick to Santa Clara in their own half.
Throw-in Braga.
In the minute 48, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Braga at Braga Municipal.
Braga have been awarded a corner by Rui Costa.
In the minute 49, In Braga Braga attack through Wenderson Galeno. The finish is off target, however.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Braga.
Santa Clara have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 50, Mansur of Santa Clara gets in a strike, but is off target.
Goal kick for Braga at Braga Municipal.
Can Santa Clara capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Braga's half?
In the minute 52, Braga's Ricardo Esgaio gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Santa Clara have a goal kick.
Ball safe as Braga is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 53, Throw-in high up the field for Braga in Braga.
Braga attack but Paulinho's header doesn't find the target.
Santa Clara have a goal kick.
In the minute 54, Throw-in for Santa Clara close to the penalty box.
Free kick Braga.
Throw-in for Santa Clara in the half of Braga.
In the minute 57, Free kick for Braga in their own half.
Iuri Medeiros (Braga) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Braga push forward at Braga Municipal and Paulinho gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Santa Clara defence.
In the minute 58, Santa Clara awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Can Braga get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Santa Clara's half?
Corner awarded to Braga.
In the minute 60, Ricardo Horta (Braga) gets in a great strike â€“ straight into the post! Ohhhh so close!
Ball safe as Santa Clara is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 61, Throw-in for Braga in the half of Santa Clara.
Andre Castro is on a sub for Andre Horta for Braga.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Braga needs to be cautious. Santa Clara have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 63, Free kick for Braga in their own half.
Braga's Ricardo Esgaio breaks free at Braga Municipal. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Goal kick for Santa Clara at Braga Municipal.
In the minute 64, Fransergio of Braga gets in a strike, but is off target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Braga.
Santa Clara to take a throw-in in Braga territory.
In the minute 65, Rui Costa awards the home team a throw-in.
Free kick for Santa Clara in the half of Braga.
In Braga a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 67, Throw-in for Santa Clara in their own half.
Free kick Braga.
Ball goes out of play for a Santa Clara goal kick.
In the minute 69, Throw-in Braga.
Throw-in for Braga at Braga Municipal.
Rui Costa signals a free kick to Braga in their own half.
In the minute 70, Braga awarded a free kick in their own half.
Braga drive forward but Ricardo Esgaio is judged offside.
Ricardo Horta of Braga smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 72, Rui Costa signals a Braga throw-in in Santa Clara's half.
Can Braga get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Santa Clara's half?
Goal kick for Santa Clara at Braga Municipal.
In the minute 74, Throw-in for Braga at Braga Municipal.
Cryzan for Santa Clara has been booked by Rui Costa and receives a first yellow card.
Iuri Medeiros (Braga) strikes â€“ and hits the bar! Ohhhh so close!
In the minute 75, It's a goal kick for the away team in Braga.
Can Braga get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Santa Clara's half?
Rui Costa signals a free kick to Santa Clara in their own half.
In the minute 78, Rui Costa signals a Santa Clara throw-in in Braga's half.
Rui Costa signals a free kick to Santa Clara.
Osama Rashid for Santa Clara gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 80, Rui Costa awards Braga a goal kick.
Braga to take a throw-in in Santa Clara territory.
Julio Rodrigues Romao is replacing Osama Rashid for the away team.
In the minute 83, Throw-in for Santa Clara in their own half.
Free kick for Santa Clara in their own half.
Important block from the Santa Clara defence as Ricardo Horta fires in a strike for Braga.
In the minute 85, Paulinho (Braga) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Braga are coming forward and Andre Castro gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Santa Clara have a goal kick.
In the minute 85, Carlos Carvalhal is making the team's fourth substitution at Braga Municipal with Guilherme Schettine replacing Nuno Sequeira.
In Braga Braga's Paulinho is caught offside.
Ball safe as Braga is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 87, Rui Costa awards the away team a throw-in.
Throw-in Braga.
Free kick Braga.
In the minute 89, Wenderson Galeno (Braga) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
Ball goes out of play for a Santa Clara goal kick.
Throw-in for Santa Clara in the half of Braga.
Braga awarded a throw-in in their own half.
4 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
In Braga a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Paulinho (Braga) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
Goal kick for Santa Clara at Braga Municipal.
Rui Costa blows against Braga's Ricardo Esgaio for offside.
Santa Clara awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick for Braga in the half of Santa Clara.
Braga's Andre Castro is back in action after a slight knock.
That's full-time at Braga Municipal. The final score is 0-1.
Daniel Ramos (Santa Clara) is making a third substitution, with Joao Lucas replacing Salomao.
The away team replace Carlos Carvalho with Ukra.
Daniel Ramos is making the team's fifth substitution at Braga Municipal with Pierre Sagna replacing Rafael Ramos.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Andre Castro.
Joao Afonso is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
Joao Afonso (Santa Clara) has received a first yellow card.
